index_logoAlt: Avoid & Get on the tempo, URLATE
nameText: Nickname must consist of a string of 5 to 12 characters (A-Z, a-z, _, -).
pwText: The secondary password must consist of 4-6 digits of the number 0 through 9.
access_denined_text: You do not have permission to access.
needToSave: It is recommended to save the pattern before testing.
DeleteSure: Caution! When you click the OK button, all the work in progress disappears.
RUSure: Are you really going to end? All work in progress disappears.
zoomAlert: The device or browser magnification is not 100%. The editor may not work properly. Current magnification:
nameExist: The nickname you entered already exists.
cursor_size_warning: *It does not affect the judgment range.
detail_lang_warning: *It may not operate normally until reconnection.
syncAlert: The set user offset is greater or less than ±50 ms. The offset timing displayed by the canvas is displayed in blue.
sound_volume_tip: You can quickly adjust the volume by using Shift + Scroll in the game.
nothing_here: Nothing here,/how about checking out the / or /skins/?
move_to_game_after_1: We will move to the game in
warning1: Some people may develop photosensitivity seizures that they have not experienced in the past when viewing sparkling videos or images.
warning2: The elements of URLATE were created with this in mind, but it is necessary to keep caution to any symptoms.
warning3: If you or a family member has ever had a photosensitive seizure, you should consult a doctor before starting the game.
warning4: The use of cheats in the game is strictly prohibited, regardless of type.
warning5: We are always checking the player's play history, and cheat users will be banned.
warning6: The songs, images, and some elements included in URLATE are not owned by Team Croissant or Coupy and dissemination may lead to legal penalties.
coupon_invalid_1: Oops! Coupon number cannot be verified.
coupon_invalid_2: Please check that there are no typos and enter again.
coupon_used: This coupon has already been used.
already_subscribed2: You can use coupon by canceling your subscription.
timeAlert: Click the clock on the timeline to copy the current value.
moveToAlert: Please enter the time to move (seconds).
tutorial_information_1: Hello, I think you're new to URLATE!
tutorial_information_2: We recommend conducting the tutorial to show you how to understand URLATE and enjoy it more.
confirm_exit_tutorial: Would you like to skip the tutorial? You can proceed with the tutorial again in Settings.
store_tutorial_1_1: You can purchase locked songs on the STORE.
store_tutorial_1_2: The songs are included in the DLC pack,
store_tutorial_2_1: Skins that can decorate the appearance of in-game
store_tutorial_2_2: can also be purchased from STORE.
store_tutorial_2_3: It can be applied in the settings after purchase.
authentication_detail: In order to complete the registration, we proceed with identity verification.
move_to_authentication_after_2: seconds, you will be taken to the authentication screen.
cancel_subscription: Would you like to unsubscribe? ADVANCED's functions are only available during the remaining time.
shutdowned_alert: Minors under the age of 16 are restricted from using the game from 0:00 to 6:00.
adult_alert: Minors must have the consent of their legal representative to play the game. Please proceed with the authentication using the mobile phone of the legal representative.
person_alert: You already have another account. URLATE sets the usage rule to use one account per person.
adult_retry_alert: Authorization of legal representative is required. Please try again with an adult mobile phone number.
medal_description: Medals earned through gameplay. In turn, you can obtain high accuracy (PERFECT or less than 10 greats), PERFECT play (0 miss or bullet), and clearing.
advanced_needed: You must be subscribed to ADVANCED to play this song.
DLC_needed: You must purchase DLC to play this song.
not_available_1: There is no pattern for this difficulty yet :(
not_available_2: We are trying to develop a pattern as soon as possible, so please wait a little bit!
advanced_preview_1: This pattern is being released first on ADVANCED!
advanced_preview_2: By joining ADVANCED, you can play all new patterns a week in advance.
safari_alert: Not available on Safari browser or mobile :(
info_title3: What kind of game is URLATE?
info_title4: Where can I find the source of URLATE?
info_title5: Are there any plans for a sequel?
info1: URLATE is a game that was developed in 2018, released its first demo version in 2020, and was crowdfunded on Tumblbug.
info2: After funding, the game was officially released on November 11, 2021 after reflecting user feedback through two rounds of CBT.
info2+: Since then, we have tried to improve BM, and harmonize the team, but due to various difficult situations, we could not find the sustainability of the game. As a result, the service was eventually terminated in January 2022.
info3: URLATE LITE is a project that creates and distributes open source games based on URLATE, a game that has been discontinued.
info4: All monetization elements such as the store and membership of the existing URLATE have been removed, leaving only the gameplay/editor functions.
info5: URLATE is a rhythm bullet shooting game.
info6: Use your mouse to move your cursor and avoid bullets flying from all directions, while clicking notes at the right timing.
info7: A rhythm game project that started in 2017 under the name MyRhy, took its current form after experimenting with several versions.
info8: The original source is available at the link above. Please see the README in the repository for information on usage and modification.
info9: Currently, URLATE2 (tentative title) is in the planning stage..! For more information and latest news, check Coupy's
info14: We do not plan to proceed with any updates other than simple bug fixes or pattern additions.
info15: URLATE LITE has a great meaning as an archive of the existing v3, and for the time being, it is to focus on URLATE2 (tentative title).
info16: Adding new features through browser extensions or contributions through PR/Issue through GitHub repositories are always welcome, so please take a lot of interest.
menu_volume: Volume can be adjusted with Shift + mouse wheel.
